titles.title: Veterans' New Fitzsimons Health Care Facilities Act of 2003
A bill to authorize the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to construct, lease, or modify major medical facilities at the site of the former Fitzsimons Army Medical Center, Aurora, Colorado.
Veterans' New Fitzsimons Health Care Facilities Act of 2003

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Committee on Veterans' Affairs. Hearings held.

bill.summary: Veterans' New Fitzsimons Health Care Facilities Act of 2003 - Authorizes the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to carry out major medical facility projects at the site of the former Fitzsimons Army Medical Center in Aurora, Colorado, that may include inpatient and outpatient facilities providing acute, sub-acute, primary, and long-term care services.Directs the Secretary and the Secretary of the Air Force to undertake appropriate joint activities to address the health care needs of veterans and members of the Air Force on active duty.
